page.title: 13GREEN BELT (1)
page.content: At first the brook went quite slowly.Outside our schools pedestrian gate,the bridge is made of concrete and has wooden sides.Further up the stream ,there is a bridge made of metal and about 3 yards after that,there is a road called Holt Drive going over the brook.Further up,past Lodge Farm School, Sandalwood Road goes over brook.The brook starts as a little spring in the Outwoods and then flows through Loughborough to the Soar,then the Trent and the Humber then it finishes at the sea.We saw lots of plant life,for instance,outside the school there are Horsechestnut trees,Hawthorn bushes and Lime Trees.And by the brook there are Willow trees and Lilac bushes.We saw Daisies,Buttercups and Sycamore trees.There were 33 new trees planted
